title: NYC Taxi Fare Starter Kernel - Simple Linear Model
description: This is a basic Starter Kernel for the New York City Taxi Fare Prediction Playground CompetitionHere we'll use a simple linear model based on the travel vector from the taxi's pickup location to dropoff location which predicts the fare_amount of each ride. This kernel uses some pandas and mostly numpy for the critical work.  There are many higher-level libraries you could use instead, for example sklearn or statsmodels.
description_lemmatized: basic starter kernel new york city taxi fare prediction playground competitionhere well use simple linear model based travel vector taxi pickup location dropoff location predicts fare_amount ride kernel us panda mostly numpy critical work many higherlevel library could use instead example sklearn statsmodels
